title: Replacement of Web API - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
text: The Web API has been replaced with the Operations REST Interface. The commands and the reply has been changed. For example the reply from the GET workflow status command: Web API Operations REST Interface <workflow> <current-ec>ec1</current-ec> <last-action-type>STARTED</last-action-type> <source-file-left>4</source-file-left> <key>MZ1290001112344_1</key> <name>Default.disk.workflow_1</name> <state>RUNNING_STATE</state> <manual-mode>false</manual-mode> </workflow { "state": "Running", "runningEc": "ec1", "storedEc": "ec1", "parameters": { "Interval": 4096, "timeunit": "SECONDS" }, "enabled": true, "workflowName": "Workflow_1", "templateName": "Default.collectWorkflow", "useExtRef": { "Interval": true, "timeunit": false }, "pendingChanges": true, "workflow debug mode": true, "configVersion": 3, "lastModifiedDate": "2022-04-21T12:06:02.391Z", "nodeNames": "/{"agent_1", "agent_2"}", "packageName": "myPackage", "packageVersion": "1.0", "lockerWfName": "Default.collectWorkflow.wf1", "warnings": "Workflow is invalid due to missing required parameter x.", "creator": "SomeUserId", "packageNameAndVersion": "string", "type": "string", "action": "STARTED" } Look for Web API commands used in your scripts and/or third party products: Example of URL for 8.3 http://localhost:9000/webapi/v1/workflows/MZ1290001112344_1 See the documentation for the Operations API for information on the particular commands used: Operations REST Interface .

chunks.text: The Web API has been replaced with the Operations REST Interface. The commands and the reply has been changed.
